name: Molten Mail
description:
When played: Apply Pyro Application to the Emperor of Fire and Iron with this card equipped.
After your Shield Status other than Armored Crab Carapace or Shield Combat Status is removed: The Emperor of Fire and Iron with this card equipped gains 2 stacks of Armored Crab Carapace. (Once per Round)
(You must have Emperor of Fire and Iron in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

storytext: "Imagine this world: All of humanity has been purged from Teyvat, and the ever-growing Emperor of Fire and Iron eventually wears the Palais Mermonia upon its body like a luxurious coat of white stone."
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Emperor of Fire and Iron at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
